9d36e19d-4f7f-496d-a8ff-24287e0943b0.description: 1. Evaluates welding processes to maximize deposition efficiency per labor hour. 2. Ensures adherence to qualified WPSs for quality and efficiency. 3. Calculates labor and material costs for welding operations. 4. Ensures that welders are properly trained to maximize both quality and productivity. 5. Analyzes operating factor to maximize welding productivity. 6. Evaluates manufacturing workflows to minimize production inefficiencies.
9d36e19d-4f7f-496d-a8ff-24287e0943b0.name: Certified Welding Supervisor (CWS)

a0c6ab11-160d-475b-add8-dd032830bbaa.description: Earners of the CWI credential have demonstrated the knowledge and skill required to perform inspections and verify compliance in a variety of applications. Certified Welding Inspectors are capable of verifying standards of base material compliance, filler metal compliance, storage and handling compliance, base material, and filler metal compatibility. They are able to properly document and certify the results while observing all applicable safety requirements.
a0c6ab11-160d-475b-add8-dd032830bbaa.name: AWS Certified Welding Inspector (CWI)

alignments.name: AWS approved by the American National Standards Institute (ANSI)
alignments.description: AWS Standards follow a strict set of rules and requirements that govern the standards approval process and all the technical committees responsible for their maintenance.

badge_template_activities.title: Meet the minimum education and work experience requirements
Completed online and/or in-person certification training

Ability to Perform Inspections: (1) perform visual examinations  (2) verify examination procedure compliance  (3) review examination results compliance  (4) develop visual inspection procedures (before, during, and after welding)  (5) provide NDE inspection planning and scheduling (before, during, and after a project)  (6) review welding inspection reports  (7) verify implementation of nondestructive and destructive evaluation methods

Ability to Verify Standards of (1) base material compliance  (2)  filler metal compliance  (3)  filler metal storage/handling compliance  (4)  inspection records compliance  (5)  proper documentation compliance  (6)  base material and filler metal compatibility  (7) certify documented results compliance  (8)  procedure qualification records compliance  (9)  welding procedure compliance  (10)  NDE procedures compliance

Develop and provide a training program for the Associate Welding Inspector (AWI), develop visual inspection training, verify implementation of visual inspection training and evaluate the Associate Welding Inspector's performance

skills.name: Verify Implementation Of Visual Inspection Training
